    • createRoom

      public Room createRoom(String roomId)
      If a room with given roomId doesn't exist, create a new one. If it does, return it.
      Parameters:
      roomId - The room's id
      Returns:
      The created room or the one with given roomId

    • getPlayerByClient

      Parameters:
      client - The client.
      Returns:
      The player which has the cliente. Null if none have.
